fabric

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • polyglot.main.Main
      • fabric.Main

  • public class Main
extends polyglot.main.Main
    Main is the main program of the compiler extension. It simply invokes Polyglot's main, passing in the extension's ExtensionInfo.
